channel.title: Authors on Imint Investors
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Imint Investors

item.title: Simon Mika
item.description: Simon was the first non-founder employee of Imint and once the CTO of Imint and played a cruicial role in moving company towards the smartphone and consumer market. As of February 2016 he is no longer part of the company. Currently he is one of the ten biggest shareholders.
